entry.title: Love with Lark @Bytedance
entry.summary: I joined ByteDance in 2019 as a UX designer. The project I focus on named Lark, chinese name Feishu.
entry.content:
I joined ByteDance in 2019 as a UX designer. The project I focus on named Lark, chinese name Feishu.

What's Lark?

Essential Work Tools, Seamless Connection

We believe your work is shaped by the tools you use. Lark integrates messaging, video conferencing, schedule management, collaborative documents, cloud storage, email, and workflow applications to provide a seamless collaboration experience on all your devices.

If you wanna learn more about Lark, click this home page link

The functional modules I focused on is Passport, Which including login registration and account center.I cannot show too many design ideas of passport because of the confidentiality agreement. Welcome everyone to experience our passport path.

Some promotional images



üòò

entry.title: MOGU Street Annual meeting in 2018
entry.summary: Although I have left MOGU Street , I have to say that the quality of MOGU Street Annual meeting exceeds that of any company in Zhejiang Province.
entry.content: Although I have left MOGU Street , I have to say that the quality of MOGU Street Annual meeting exceeds that of any company in Zhejiang Province.
